experience.title: Data Scientist Intern

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern

interaction_history.response: Based on your skills in Python, Machine Learning, and SQL, you're well-suited for roles like Data Scientist, Data Analyst, or Machine Learning Engineer. Would you like more information about any of these roles?

interaction_history.query: How can I improve my resume for data scientist positions?
interaction_history.response: To strengthen your resume for Data Scientist positions, consider: 1) Adding quantifiable achievements to your experience section, 2) Highlighting specific ML projects you've completed, 3) Adding experience with cloud platforms like AWS or GCP, and 4) Including any relevant certifications in data science or machine learning.
